* Command directs the program to take certain actions.
* DeadlineCommand creates and adds a new deadline to the task list.
* @param doBy End date and time of deadline task.
* Executes DeadlineCommand by creating and adding new Deadlines object into task list.
* @param taskList List of tasks to add deadline into.
* DeleteCommand deletes the chosen task from the task list.
* @param index Index of task in task list to be deleted.
* Executes DeleteCommand by deleting chosen task from task list.
* @param taskList Task list containing the task to be deleted.
* EventCommand creates and adds a new event task to the task list.
* @param atTime Time at which event is to take place.
* Executes EventCommand by creating and adding new Events object to the task list.
* @param taskList Task list to add new Events task to.

* ListCommand prints out all the tasks in the task list.
* Executes ListCommand by iterating through each task and printing out its string representation.
* @param taskList Task list to be printed out.

* MarkCommand marks the chosen task as completed.
* @param index Index of task to be marked.
* Executes MarkCommand by marking chosen task as completed and prints confirmation.
* @param taskList Task list containing task to be marked.
System.out.println("Nice! I've marked this task as done:\n" + "  " + taskList.retrieveTask(index).toString());
* TodoCommand creates and adds a new Todos task to the task list.
* Executes TodoCommand by creating and adding the new Todos task to the task list.
* @param taskList Task list to which the new Todos should be added to.
* UnMarkCommand marks the chosen task as incomplete.
* @param index Index of task to be unmarked.
* Executes UnMarkCommand by marking chosen task as incomplete and prints confirmation.
